response: data privacy has become a significant concern for individuals and businesses alike in the age of big data. governments around the world are enacting laws to protect individual privacy rights. in germany, privacy is regarded as a fundamental right, and companies have a responsibility to safeguard personal information. twitter must ensure that they comply with german data protection regulations while collecting and storing user data. additionally, twitter must be transparent about how it uses this information and offer users the ability to opt-out or delete their data at any time.
